name: Gritbooks
author: BladeYGO
notes: Tried out 23 Card Sylvans, better than strength Sylvans, and more consistent than 30 card. Ran 2 hole because the cards broken, and typically you only see 1 per duel. Played grit instead of restart because The deck is already consistent enough. Barely lost, Sylvans were easy, fool engine was super powerful, and overall was a very easy kog, no offense to anyone I played against.
